wikipedia_page.main: Erik Richard Sidney Fifoot MC (14 June 1925 – 24 June 1992) was a British librarian who served as Bodley's Librarian, the head of the Bodleian Library at the University of Oxford, from 1979 to 1981.

response: Fifoot married Hjördis Baars, younger daughter of Dr Eriksen of Kongsberg, Norway, in 1924. Their only son, Richard Fifoot, was Bodley's Librarian from 1979 to 1981.
